## onPrimitiveTypeSelect() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function onPrimitiveTypeSelect<TResult>(type: PrimitiveType, selectors: {
    onBoolean: () => TResult;
    onNumerical: () => TResult;
    onAddress: () => TResult;
    onBytes: () => TResult;
    onString: () => TResult;
    onH256: () => TResult;
    onTokenIndetifier: () => TResult;
    onNothing: () => TResult;
    onOther?: () => TResult;
}): TResult;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [PrimitiveType](./sdk-core.primitivetype.md) |  |
|  selectors | { onBoolean: () =&gt; TResult; onNumerical: () =&gt; TResult; onAddress: () =&gt; TResult; onBytes: () =&gt; TResult; onString: () =&gt; TResult; onH256: () =&gt; TResult; onTokenIndetifier: () =&gt; TResult; onNothing: () =&gt; TResult; onOther?: () =&gt; TResult; } |  |
